## Ignore Visual Studio temporary files, build results, and
## user-specific files
.vs/
*.user
*.suo
*.userosscache
*.sln.docstates

## Ignore build outputs
bin/
obj/
[Bb]uild/
[Ll]og/
*.log

## Ignore NuGet packages
packages/
*.nupkg
project.lock.json
project.assets.json
*.snupkg

## Ignore Rider and JetBrains files
.idea/
*.sln.iml

## Ignore test results
TestResults/
*.trx
*.coverage
*.coveragexml
*.testsettings
*.vsmdi

## Ignore build artifacts
*.dll
*.exe
*.pdb

## Ignore Web config transforms
web.*.config

## Ignore generated files
*.Generated.cs
Generated_Code/

## Ignore publish output
publish/
*.Publish.xml

## Ignore ReSharper files
_ReSharper*/
*.[Rr]e[Ss]harper

## Ignore StyleCop cache
StyleCop.Cache

## Ignore AutoMapper .mapping files (if used)
*.mapping

## Ignore local database
*.mdf
*.ldf
*.dbmdl

## Ignore secrets (if any)
secrets.json

## Ignore JetBrains Rider workspace
.idea/

## Ignore Coverlet code coverage output
coverage.json
coverage.opencover.xml
coverage.cobertura.xml
coverage.info
coverage/

## Ignore custom settings
*.local.json
.env
